[INST] What was the main cause of World War I? [/INST]

The main cause of World War I was the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria-Hungary by a Serbian nationalist in Sarajevo, Bosnia, on June 28, 1914. The war lasted for four years, resulting in millions of deaths, widespread destruction, and a profound reshaping of the global political landscape.

The harsh conditions, isolation, and hard labor during his imprisonment significantly influenced his health and work, shaping his perspective, and fueling his desire for freedom, equality, and justice, which became the cornerstone of his activism.
Robben Island
